caption.title: Accuracy, sensitivity, specificity and Matthews correlation coefficient calculated for several scenarios.
caption.p: QE as E: Treating in vivo quasi-essentials as essentials; QE as NE: Treating quasi-essentials as non-essentials; No QE genes: Excluding all genes quasi-essential in vivo; QE as E, no AA genes: Excluding genes related to amino acid utilization, and treating quasi-essentials as essentials; QE as NE, no AA genes: Excluding genes related to amino acid utilization, and treating quasi-essentials as non-essentials.

tr.td: QE as E, no AA gene
QE as NE, no AA genes
